items.sentence: We asked Tom when he was planning to get here.
Last week's discussion wasn't very productive.
Tom wants to have his picture taken with Mary.
It went about as well as I could've hoped for.
You don't know me as well as you think you do.
This holds true for husbands as well as wives.
I'm not good at French, but I have studied it.
If you don't mind, I'd rather speak in French.
Tom usually tries not to drive through cities.
Tom was afraid that people would laugh at him.
